From: Elena Rodriguez <erodriguez@brickfieldep.com>
To: Marcus Webb <mwebb@brickfieldep.com>
Date: November 08, 2023 12:00 AM
Subject: Management team changes - TechStart Inc.

**From:** Sarah Thompson, Senior Associate  
**To:** John Mitchell, Managing Director  
**Date:** October 12, 2023  
**Subject:** Update on Management Team Changes at TechStart Inc.

---

Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to provide you with an update regarding the recent management team changes at TechStart Inc., which we discussed during our last investment committee meeting.

As of October 9, 2023, TechStart has successfully appointed Jane Doe as the new Chief Technology Officer, replacing Mark Harris, who has stepped down due to personal reasons. Jane brings over 15 years of experience in the tech industry, having previously held senior positions at Innovative Solutions and TechGiant Corp. Her expertise in software development and team leadership is expected to drive the company’s upcoming product launch of the TechStart 2.0 platform, scheduled for Q1 2024.

Additionally, we have transitioned Tom Brown from Head of Product Management to Chief Operating Officer. Tom’s intimate knowledge of our operational processes and market dynamics makes him an ideal fit for this role. His promotion aligns with our strategic goal to enhance operational efficiencies and scale TechStart’s current offerings. 

I believe these changes will strengthen the management team and are critical as we prepare for our Series B funding round, projected to occur in late Q1 2024. With our current valuation at $200 million, our aim is to secure an additional $50 million to further invest in R&D and marketing, which will help enhance our competitive position in the market.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you require any additional information. I will keep you updated on their progress and any further developments as we move forward.

Best regards,

Sarah Thompson  
Senior Associate  
[Your Private Equity Firm Name]  
[Your Contact Information]
